div.style: float: left; border: 1px solid black; width: 32%; height:750px; margin-right: 1%;
text-align:center; display:flex;justify-content: center; position:absolute; left: 0px;top: 0px; height: 100%; width: 100%;opacity:0.20;font-size:4em ;

hr.style: height: 1px; border-width: 0; color: black; background-color: grey;

td.style: text-align: left; color: grey; width: 70%; font-size:12px;
width: 60px; height:70px ; text-align: center; vertical-align: top;

hr.style: height: 1px; border-width: 0; color: black; background-color: black;

td.style: text-align: left; border: 1px solid black; font-size:11px;
text-align: right; border: 1px solid black; font-size:11px;
text-align: left; border: 1px solid black; font-size:11px;
text-align: right; border: 1px solid black; font-size:11px;
text-align: left; border: 1px solid black; font-size:11px;

div.p: Late Payment Fine Slab: Days after due date:

table.style: text-align: center; font-size:11px; margin-left: 5%; border-collapse:collapse; width:90%;

td.style: border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey

span.strong: For every subsequent 10 days add Rs500

div.p:
In case of any query please contact the school office or the LACAS accounts department. The amount can be deposited through Cheque of Bank Alfalah or cash at any branch of Bank Alfalah except Alfalah Islamic Branch.
Online payment using 1 Bill option. Debit/Credit card is also available as per details mentioned on LACAS website. Security is refundable only if one month's advance notice is given in writing or one month's advance fee is paid. Security is refundable within 6 months of withdrawal or leaving. For A level students, security is refundable after completion of A level.
Bank will not be responsible for any financial loss in case Deposit Slip/ Challan bears rubber stamp impression instead of FBP (Flatbed Printer endorsement).

In case of any query please contact the school office or the LACAS accounts department. The amount can be deposited through Cheque of Bank Alfalah or cash at any branch of Bank Alfalah except Alfalah Islamic Branch.
Online payment using 1 Bill option. Debit/Credit card is also available as per details mentioned on LACAS website. Security is refundable only if one month's advance notice is given in writing or one month's advance fee is paid. Security is refundable within 6 months of withdrawal or leaving. For A level students, security is refundable after completion of A level.
Bank will not be responsible for any financial loss in case Deposit Slip/ Challan bears rubber stamp impression instead of FBP (Flatbed Printer endorsement).
